document_data.name: All-Seeing Crystal Ball
document_data.mainbody: '''''All-seeing crystal ball''''' was a [[divine magic|divine]] spell available to worshipers of [[Savras]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell allowed the caster to create a ''[[crystal ball]]'' with a diameter of {{SI|6|in|c|long=yes}}. On top of having all the powers of a regular ''crystal ball'', this spell allowed the caster to cast any divination-based spell through the ball to a target. Powerful clerics where able to embed the ''[[Clairaudience/clairvoyance|clairaudience]]'', ''[[ESP]]'' or ''[[telepathy]]'' spells into the ''crystal ball''.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[somatic]] and [[verbal]] components, this spell required [[material component]]s, a ball of snow and ice or fine [[sand]] shaped into a sphere, and the [[holy symbol]] of the caster.
